title: League 8- Bit Lore themed games
body:
I am looking for a few digital artists to help me make a 8-bit league themed plat former based of lol lore, please be aware this is something that is free, so no payment sorry, but making an awesome game with this community would be great, just to start off for some example work, could some artists develop a Zed or Shen 8 Bit sprite sheet
**EDIT: please comment suggestions and  we need sound developers if you are an artist working on the example stuff comment**
Let The Artists BEGIN!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: If you're looking to have voice acting in it, I have a really good friend who is a good voice actor who loves this kind of stuff (he can do pretty much all the voice filters for the champs.)
we might be able to do it purely from sound if reaktor is up to it but if we cant then ill tell you on the boards
ok sweet as

ok reaktor cant do it (i have him on fb lol
get ur friend to add me and give me his email and ill give him mine :D
hey man im that voice actor friend of his, heres my email quinnbb123@gmail.com

Hey dude,

You really shouldn't post your email publically on the boards, or anywhere for that matter.
It's basically the same as waving a flag that says "I want to receive large amounts of unsolicited spam emails".

Hey seph,
Its me reported4verbal on a smurf. 
Could you please tell me what the comment was you deleted on my post? 
Thanks
Thanks

Sweet as i asked him to comment here
he's Rusty Spoons
Sounds cool, can't wait to give it a try when its ready.
well i need some artists right now it s  all concept

also on a side note those 4 things in the pole are the first 4 level, the votes will order in which coms first  development and release wise :) 




{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Dude i can't wait, keep up the good work guys! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
and can i ask what software you will be using to make this Project?
Unknown at current time

I'm looking forward to this. I posted a thread asking about more lore based gameplay and this is a really nice idea.
Can't wait to try it!
It's gotta be {{champion:238}} {{champion:98}} .
Lol Yeh I guess it does but it also features AKALI and kennen playable as bystanders
maybe do the event levels in order of where they are in the timeline of the lore if that can be found
There is no date system in the league lore, so unfortunately I can't so for the first 4 levels im letting U guys choose :)

I'd do 99% of the sound ;)

2 OSC on Square or Saw ;)
Lol what's the 1%????
